channel.title: Adding Bank all option and exit out button
channel.description: I wanted to add the bank all option to my RSPS if you can help me that be mint! Thanks this is what it looks like ATM [img]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/3601/110808153001.png[/img] I want a [x] in the top right corner and a Bank all option in the bottom left corner.
